TopicTitle: Getting extra storage on my Ipad with a exsternal drive?

Articles.Content: Could any app that can reed files like [https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fileapp-file-manager-document/id297804694?mt=8](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fileapp-file-manager-document/id297804694?mt=8) could that help extend my storage if I have a USB device with out Jailbreaking it?Can I use a 1TB USB drive for my Ipad?
